code: import React from'react';import{DocumentTextIcon,ClipboardDocumentIcon,FolderIcon,ArchiveBoxIcon,BookOpenIcon,InboxIcon,InformationCircleIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const docsData=[{title:'Store/Club/DC & GLN Lists',tooltip:'Store/Club/DC & GLN Lists',icon:DocumentTextIcon},{title:'Supplier Replenishment Information',tooltip:'Supplier Replenishment Information',icon:ClipboardDocumentIcon},{title:'Supplier Guide',tooltip:'Supplier Guide',icon:BookOpenIcon},{title:'Forms',tooltip:'Forms',icon:FolderIcon},{title:'Global Sourcing Supplier Administration',tooltip:'Global Sourcing Supplier Administration',icon:ArchiveBoxIcon},{title:'Order Management System Supplier Training',tooltip:'Order Management System',icon:ClipboardDocumentIcon},{title:'Global Procurement Information',tooltip:'Global Procurement Information',icon:InboxIcon},{title:'New DC Sites/Warehouse Realignments',tooltip:'New DC Sites/Warehouse Realignments',icon:FolderIcon},{title:'Wal-Mart Produce Standards',tooltip:'Wal-Mart Produce Standards',icon:InformationCircleIcon},{title:'Packaging & Component Disclosure',tooltip:'Packaging & Component Disclosure',icon:DocumentTextIcon}];const Docs=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 bg-gray-100 min-h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-gray-800",children:"Documentation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:docsData.map((doc,i)=>{const Icon=doc.icon;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-4 rounded shadow flex items-center space-x-4 hover:bg-blue-50 transition duration-200 cursor-pointer",title:doc.tooltip,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"w-10 h-10 text-blue-600"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-800",children:doc.title})]},i);})})]});};export default Docs;
